feature_defs.trigger: when a creature has one of your bardic inspiration dice
effects: Defense: when the creature is hit by an attack roll, it can use its reaction to roll the bardic inspiration die and add the number to its AC for that attack.
Offense: immediately after the creature hits with an attack roll, it can roll the bardic inspiration die and add the number to the attackaTMs damage.
You gain proficiency with martial weapons and training with medium armor and shields.
You can use a simple or martial weapon as a spellcasting focus for bard spells.

feature_defs.trigger: when you take the attack action on your turn
effects: You can attack twice instead of once.
You can cast a bard cantrip with a casting time of 1 action in place of one of those attacks.
